patch.description:
This endpoint allows quick editing of tag associations by specifying which tags
to attach or detach from the item. It provides fine-grained control over tag
operations without requiring a full item update.

parameters.description: - The item to update tags for

post.description:
Converts Markdown formatted text to HTML for display purposes.
The input is validated to ensure it contains safe Markdown content.
post.summary: Convert Markdown to HTML
tags:
Markdown

API endpoints for Markdown processing and conversion

post.description:
Converts HTML content to Markdown format with controlled tag support.
Only allowed HTML tags will be processed, others will be stripped.
post.summary: Convert HTML to Markdown
tags:
Markdown

API endpoints for Markdown processing and conversion

post.description: Validates Markdown content without converting it, useful for form validation.
post.summary: Validate Markdown content
tags:
Markdown

API endpoints for Markdown processing and conversion

post.description:
Generates an HTML preview of Markdown content for display purposes.
This is essentially the same as markdownToHtml but with a different semantic meaning.
post.summary: Preview Markdown content
tags:
Markdown

API endpoints for Markdown processing and conversion

enum: Failed to convert markdown to HTML

post.description:
Analyzes content to determine if it appears to contain Markdown formatting.
Useful for automatic detection of content type.
post.summary: Check if content is Markdown

id.description: The unique identifier of the picture (GUID)

path.description: The path to the picture file

comment.description: A user defined comment associated with the file

id.description: The unique identifier of the context (GUID)

internal_name.description: The name of the context, it shall only be used internally

backward_compatibility.description: The legacy Id when this context corresponds to a legacy context from the MWNF3 database, nullable

is_default.description: Indicates if this context is the default one. There is one single default context for the entire database.

id.description: The unique identifier of the country (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code)

internal_name.description: The name of the country, it shall only be used internally

backward_compatibility.description: The legacy Id when this country corresponds to a legacy country from the MWNF3 database, nullable

id.description: The unique identifier of the item (GUID)

internal_name.description: The name of the item, it shall only be used internally

item.description: The item this detail belongs to

backward_compatibility.description: The legacy Id when this item corresponds to a legacy item from the MWNF3 database, nullable

translations.description: Translations for this detail (internationalization and contextualization)

id.description: The unique identifier of the picture (GUID)

path.description: The path to the picture file

name.description: The original name of the uploaded file

extension.description: The file extension of the uploaded file

mime_type.description: The MIME type of the uploaded file

size.description: The size of the uploaded file in bytes

id.description: The unique identifier of the item (GUID)

internal_name.description: The name of the item, it shall only be used internally

backward_compatibility.description: The legacy Id when this item corresponds to a legacy item from the MWNF3 database, nullable

type.description: The type of the item, either 'object' or 'monument'

owner_reference.description: Owner's reference number for the item

mwnf_reference.description: MWNF reference number for the item

project.description: The project this item belongs to, nullable

country.description: The country this item is associated with, nullable

translations.description: Translations for this item (internationalization and contextualization)

id.description: The unique identifier of the language (ISO 639-1 code)

internal_name.description: The name of the language, it shall only be used internally

backward_compatibility.description: The legacy Id when this language corresponds to a legacy language from the MWNF3 database, nullable

is_default.description: Indicates if this language is the default one. There is one single default language for the entire database.

id.description: The unique identifier of the partner (GUID)

internal_name.description: The name of the partner, it shall only be used internally

backward_compatibility.description: The legacy Id when this partner corresponds to a legacy partner from the MWNF3 database, nullable

type.description: The type of the partner, either 'museum',  'institution' or 'individual'

country.description: The country this partner is associated with, nullable

id.description: The unique identifier of the picture (UUID)

internal_name.description: The internal name of the picture

backward_compatibility.description: The legacy ID when this picture corresponds to a legacy image from the MWNF3 database, nullable

path.description: The path to the picture file

copyright_text.description: The copyright text associated with the picture

copyright_url.description: The URL for the copyright information

upload_name.description: The original name of the uploaded file

upload_extension.description: The file extension of the uploaded file

upload_mime_type.description: The MIME type of the uploaded file

upload_size.description: The size of the uploaded file in bytes

pictureable_type.description: The type of the parent model (Item, Detail, Partner)

pictureable_id.description: The ID of the parent model

id.description: The unique identifier of the project (GUID)

internal_name.description: The name of the project, it shall only be used internally

backward_compatibility.description: The legacy Id when this project corresponds to a legacy project from the MWNF3 database, nullable

launch_date.description: Launch date of the project, nullable

is_launched.description: Indicates if the project has been launched already

is_enabled.description: Indicates if the project is enabled (active)

context.description: The default context used within the project

language.description: The default language used within the project

id.description: The unique identifier of the tag (GUID)

internal_name.description: The name of the tag, it shall only be used internally

backward_compatibility.description: The legacy Id when this tag corresponds to a legacy tag from the previous database, nullable

errors.description: A detailed description of each field that failed validation.
